content.question: Answer the following question(s) in English unless the question specifically asks you to provide Latin words.Identify one and only one purpose of Aeneas’s quest as described in the passage.Provide the Latin word(s) that support your answer in part (i).Translate in context the Latin word(s) you cited in part (ii).

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
